Most shocking plot twists in Riverdale

Riverdale is known for its wild and often unbelievable plot twists, which have kept viewers both entertained and bewildered. Here are some of the most shocking plot twists in Riverdale, as highlighted by Redditors:

Organ Harvesting Plot

The Organ Harvesting Plot: This storyline involved characters having their organs harvested with surprising ease. "The organ harvesting plot. They literally treated removing someone's kidney like a dentist appointment."

Rivervale

Rivervale: A parallel universe where the characters' lives were even more absurd. "everything that happened in riverVale"

Tickle Porn

Tickle Porn: A bizarre subplot involving tickle porn. "I’m sorry the tickle porn plot was just so obviously them not knowing what to do with Toni and Reggie"

Alice as an FBI Informant

Alice Undercover: The revelation that Alice Cooper was a FBI informant all along. "I hate that they made Alice an FBI informant instead of giving Alice a journey..."

Black Hood Identity

Black Hood Identity: The reveal of Hal Cooper as the Black Hood, despite inconsistencies. "The most obvious: Hal was the Black Hood. However, close-up shots of the Black Hood's eyes shows that they were green, while Hal had blue eyes."

Quad Relationship

Quad Relationship: The main four characters—Archie, Betty, Jughead, and Veronica—entering a polyamorous relationship. "Revealing betty, archie, jughead and veronica are in a quad relationship in the finale to get out of choosing final endgames is the stupidest thing riverdale has ever done imo"

Superpowers

Superpowers: The characters suddenly developing superpowers. "In all seriousness though, probably the plot line where they all get superpowers..."

Jingle Jangle

Jingle Jangle: A serious drug storyline named after a whimsical term. "Having a serious story about a dangerous drug and naming it jingle jangle"

Veronica's Speakeasy

Veronica's Speakeasy: A teenager owning a speakeasy and casino. "Veronica owning a speakeasy and casino as a teenager."

The Farm's Rocket

The Farm's Rocket: The cult known as "The Farm" building a rocket. "The endgame of The Farm - building a rocket. That just felt dumb."

Tabitha's Time Travel

Tabitha's Time Travel: Tabitha discovering she can time travel and using it to address historical issues. "They had Tabitha campaigning with the Till family, tried to stop the assassination of Martin Luther King Jr, and had the gang solve racism and homophobia from the 1960s."

Archie's Character Changes

Archie's Character Changes: Archie's sudden shift from wanting to save Riverdale to moving away. "Archie’s ending felt really strange and a bit of a 180 for him."

The Sweet Hereafter

The Sweet Hereafter: The theory that the final season is set in the afterlife. "The theory that changes everything. 'What if I told you that the entire final season of Riverdale isn't set in the past… but in the afterlife?'"
